channel.title: AI on Aban Hasan
channel.description: Recent content in AI on Aban Hasan

item.title: Technofeudalism and the Return to the Real
item.description:
what makes the modern manifestation of [[cloud capital]] that is integral to the [[Technofeudalism ]] system that we live under is that it’s impossible to go anywhere without having it glaring at you

it’s hovering above the heads of a modern people like a cloud, taking all our atttention and carefully curating it, in effect extracting life energy and transmuting it into data and narritive

[[Nick Land]] extensively talks about [[hyperstition]], and the memesis that we see via social media enables false narritives to take on a life of it’s own, often manufactured by the techno-olygarchs themselves in service of their political ambitions
